column6: the Joint Commission of the National Committee for the Prevention and Control of Natural Resource Offenses arrived in Samlot District to destroy a total of 10 trucks.------The vehicles have been used for transporting timber for the Sambath companyin the Phnom Samkos Conservation Area in Samlot District
column7: Battambang Province.------The illegal timber from the Samkosos Conservation Area had traveled through the village of Or Kroch
column9: and many families are waiting to testify to a joint committee of the National Committee for the Prevention and Suppression of Natural Resources Crime to take action against the company. ------AREY NEWS
